answers.answer: She should be tested for diabetes because it can cause urination problems and eye and mood problems.A sharp pain behind the eye can also be an sinus infection or a cluster headache.She should also be tested for a bladder infection because chronic urination can be a sign of one.She may only have one condition or she could have a few things going on at once.  Lots of times if you are sick with one thing you can get something else with it that has different symptoms.

question: My friend has this reoccuring problem where she gets this sharp pain behind her right eye, and it happens most in the morning, she has no nausea or anything, but she has chronic urination, like once a hour, and shes really irritable, and has crazy mood changes, what is wrong with her?
title: Pain Behind Right Eye
